rooms.description: Two-car garage integrated with exterior facade. Provides secure parking and easy access.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows capturing natural light and offering a panoramic view of the West-facing garden.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room. Minimalist interior design in line with Brutalist aesthetics.

openings.description: Main entry aligned to north-east, ensuring positive energy flow per Vastu guidelines.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the West-facing wall to maximize natural light and align with Vastu principles.
